item.description: St. John's loses its third game to a top-25 opponent this season after blowing a second-half lead to Auburn.

item.title: No. 2 South Carolina Tops Duke, Advances to Face Texas in Players Era Championship
item.description: No. 2 South Carolina beat Duke, 83-66, to remain undefeated and advance to the Players Era Championship, where the Gamecocks will face Texas.
